id.description: The unique identifier of the project.

name.description: The name or title of the project.

code.description: A unique identifier or code for the project.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the project is currently active.

bill_by.description: Indicates how the project is billed, e.g., hourly, fixed fee, etc.

budget.description: The allocated budget for the project.

budget_by.description: Specifies how the budget is managed, e.g., total, task, person, etc.

budget_is_monthly.description: Indicates whether the budget is monthly.

notify_when_over_budget.description: Indicates whether notifications are sent when the project goes over budget.

over_budget_notification_percentage.description: The percentage threshold for over-budget notifications.

over_budget_notification_date.description: The date for sending notifications when the project goes over budget.

show_budget_to_all.description: Indicates whether the budget is visible to all project members.

created_at.description: The date and time when the project was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the project was last updated.

starts_on.description: The start date of the project.

ends_on.description: The end date of the project.

is_billable.description: Indicates whether the project is billable.

is_fixed_fee.description: Indicates whether the project has a fixed fee.

notes.description: Any additional notes or comments related to the project.

client.description: Details of the client associated with the project.

id.description: The unique identifier of the client.

name.description: The name of the client associated with the project.

currency.description: The currency used for the project.

cost_budget.description: The total cost budget for the project.

cost_budget_include_expenses.description: Indicates whether expenses are included in the cost budget.

hourly_rate.description: The hourly rate for the project.

fee.description: The fee associated with the project.
